long_description: The svelte Gregory Sketch 15 pack comfortably hauls your essentials for a quick jaunt on the trail or a minimalist commute. Internal pocket can be used as a hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately) or to stow a tablet. Sternum straps and hipbelt can be removed to customize bag to your individual preference. Exterior lash points to clip a bike safety light. Sturdy, padded top grab handle. Reflective logo for improved visibility after dark. External side pocket for quick access to your keys and phone. Durable materials include 420D nylon on the main body, 840D ballistic polyester on high stress areas and 200D polyester on the interior.
short_description: The svelte Gregory Sketch 15 pack comfortably hauls your essentials for a quick jaunt on the trail or a minimalist commute.
